t: Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: Many sellers buying real item, removing content, switching with junk products and selling it as real but opened. On Amazon, they just get the junk from China. You don't know what's really in it and if it's really safe. It can be sealed, but that doesn't mean it's authentic.
